title: Top-ranked LB commits to USC
text:
The nation's No. 1 linebacker per 247Sports in Palaie Gaoteote announced his verbal to USC on Sunday. 
"Just the fit and it's what was right in my heart," Gaoteote told 247Sports 
Johnny Nansen was the lead recruiter for Gaoteote who chose the Trojans over Ohio State, UCLA, Washington, Alabama and USC among others 
Gaoteote helped lead Bishop Gorman to another National Championship as a junior. He is the No. 5 recruit in the country regardless of position. 
Gaoteote is commit No. 6 for Clay Helton in his staff in 2018, the second five-star, with all ranking inside the Top247. The Trojans current haul ranks sixth nationally early in the cycle. 
As a junior Gaoteote had 68 tackles with his best work coming in the biggest ball games, racking up 9 tackles including 2.5 for loss against Cedar Hill, making 11 stops with another 2.5 for loss against St. John Bosco and 12 more tackles and a forced fumble against St. Thomas Aquinas.
